name: fusingCon
description:
A confusing game with weird rooms and puzzles for you to try to solve !
Hope you have fun trying to figure out what each thing does !

Game is still in development, please let me know about any bugs or suggestions to the game!...

Tip: look in walls, some of them might be fake ;)

Controls:

 W A S D to move around

SPACE to jump

Left click to pick up items

SHIFT to sprint

Version: 1.0 (beta)

CREDITS:

everything by me lol
